const Statistics = ({good,neutral,bad}) => { const total=good +neutral+bad const average = (good - bad )/ total const positive = (good /total) * 100 total <1 ?

No Feedback given

: <>

Statistics

good {good}

neutral {neutral}

bad {bad}

total {total}

average {average?average :0}

positive {positive? positive: 0} %

; } export default Statistics;
